title: Famous People We Lost in 2025
summary: In 2025, we said goodbye to many famous people from movies, TV, and other fields. This article remembers them, including actors like Diane Keaton, who won an Oscar for Annie Hall, and Robert Redford, a handsome star who started the Sundance Film Festival. It also talks about Pope Francis, the first non-European Pope in over 1,000 years, and Ozzy Osbourne, a rock singer. Other stars mentioned are Gene Hackman, known for tough roles, and Prunella Scales, who played Sybil in Fawlty Towers. The article shares stories about their lives and careers, helping us learn why they were important. It's a way to honor their memories and the joy they brought to people around the world.
